title: Drawing, "Medallion portrait of Queen Mary I of Portugal"
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and gray wash
markings: Verso: Cooper Union Museum for the Arts of Decoration (Lugt#457d and 457e)
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Horizontal rectangle. The medallion hangs from fasces which stand in front of a manteling, hanging from a crown. Symbols, referring to the queen, are beside. Colored background. Framing line.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Medallion portrait of Queen Mary I of Portugal".
Pen and brown ink, brush and gray wash. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-4293.
